comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Congratulations and welcome onboard this platform. It is nice having you here. I checked your post looks more of advertisement for your brand which is a normal thing for organizations to do but as a new bie you will find it difficult convincing any participants here as you have no reputation onboard this platform. I will advise you to register a copper member account so you could upload pictures for a better graphics illustration because that also attrack participants as it is self explanatory of your products. Lastly, I will advise you to seek for a good manager to better advertise your product and organization through a well managed signature campaign for atmost two months for better publicity and there you will get better attention for your products as you wish to.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Welcome to the forum. Promo codes for online casinos are really in demand, it seems to me, and as a rule, the search gives out expired coupons, so if your service contains valid promo codes, then it would not be bad.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: welcome to the forum, most of the time when I see a promotional code or bonus it doesn't go many hours without everyone claiming it, I myself have already taken some time to observe this phenomenon where people run at the speed of light to claim the bonus or promotional code, for example if a casino posts a bonus code on twitter people immediately claim the bonus, if the casino posts a bonus code on telegram people immediately claim the bonusbut the other thing that I also need to mention is the fact that whenever the casino puts the bonus code they put requirements that most of the time it's only for the people who are wagering $10,000 wagered in the last 7 days so that means that Not for anyone these bonus codes and many casinos now have almost impossible requirements to be met for the person to have a bonus, something simply makes people no longer want to stay behind bonuses, I think your site may not have it a lot of traffic from people due to the TOS of the casinos regarding the bonus

Promo codes for online casinos are really in demand, it seems to me, and as a rule, the search gives out expired coupons, so if your service contains valid promo codes, then it would not be bad.If the coupon carries an expired timing, that means the promo has expired already. Lately, I have not been a fan of promos and bonuses, especially in casinos that are just starting ups as their requirement for withdrawal can drain out the motivation in any player so I will rather use a promo code from an established casino who are not desperate for players but have put in some work to see the casino succeed.

comments.author: drwhobox

Casinos offer promo codes to attract more new customers, mostly they offer codes for new users not for existing users. Also, many new casino companies give coupons or promo code so that they can acquire more faith of customers.¬† Same here, If I find promo code from established casinos or other sites, in general, I use them but I don't join a new company for their shiny offer and discounts.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Mahirap on January 04, 2023, 09:22:52 PMQuote from: Wiwo on January 04, 2023, 08:02:36 PM()Casinos offer promo codes to attract more new customers, mostly they offer codes for new users not for existing users. Also, many new casino companies give coupons or promo code so that they can acquire more faith of customers.¬† Same here, If I find promo codes from established casinos or other sites, in general, I use them but I don't join a new company for their shiny offer and discounts.One thing is that for a casino to remain in demand it must keep up with promotional programs that will motivate its potential players and not only that alone, old customers are also taken care of in terms of rake back and other cashback features on the casino. Any casino that pays attention to only new customers alone will at one point lose their old customers, you know how highly competitive the gambling market has become lately. Hundreds of casinos will want to attract other casino customers to build their customer base and increase their revenue.

comments.author: cryptocoupons
comments.body: Thank you for sharing your thoughts about VGOPromo. We appreciate your feedback and are committed to providing a high-quality, trustworthy platform for our users.In response to your concerns and questions, I would like to provide some additional information about VGOPromo:VGOPromo.com was launched in 2019 and since then, we have continuously updated the website to feature only the top bitcoin casinos. This is why you will see many familiar casinos on our site - they are the best in the industry and therefore appear first on VGOPromo. The promo codes on our website often offer the best welcome bonuses that new users can receive when they sign up for a crypto casino. Additionally, if you sign up for VGOPromo's newsletter, you will have access to limited-use promo codes from popular crypto casinos when they become available.Thank you again for your feedback. We are always looking for ways to improve the user experience on VGOPromo and will consider your comments as we continue to develop the website.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: How often do you update the promos of casinos? Do you update it on a daily basis? There are promos that are capped by the users who used it and I guess that those kind of promo won't last long, Do you still consider posting that kind of promotion in your website or just stick into semi-permanent promo that usually has longer promo duration. I like your directory website since there are reputable website that is listed there.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Are you posting the best site as well with their bonuses?This is a big help to those who want to try another site that gives more promotions and wants to be secured at the same time. Giving this summary can help us decide, just like me I always want to try new site as long as the reviews are good and with a very generous promotions and bonuses.

comments.author: cryptocoupons
comments.body: Quote from: abel1337 on January 07, 2023, 04:03:25 PMHow often do you update the promos of casinos? Do you update it on a daily basis? There are promos that are capped by the users who used it and I guess that those kind of promo won't last long, Do you still consider posting that kind of promotion in your website or just stick into semi-permanent promo that usually has longer promo duration. I like your directory website since there are reputable website that is listed there.To answer your question, we update our promos on a regular basis, but not necessarily on a daily basis. We strive to keep our listings as up-to-date as possible, but we also want to make sure that we are providing accurate and reliable information to our users.As for promos that are capped by the number of users who can use them, we do consider posting those types of promotions on our website. However, we also try to balance that with offering a mix of both short-term and long-term promos. This way, our users have a range of options to choose from, depending on their preferences.We are glad to hear that you find our directory website to be helpful, and we will continue to do our best to provide a valuable resource for online gamers. Thank you for your support!
